entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong random read behaviour in StreamReader #110509
  • [API Proposal]: `TextReader.ReadLines` and `ReadAllLines` #110508

Closed

  • Is it possible to add System.Management for netstandard2.1 and remove System.CodeDom dependencies? #110507
  • Non-english languages bug in terminal in .Net 8 #108918

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Normalization APIs using the spans #110465
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate assertions into natural loops in global morph #110501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow stack size to be configured for native AOT #110455
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added a fix for the build failure when STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT is defined. #110506
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110484
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool install did not install the latest version #45370
  • nuget audit warnings report and counted twice #45367

Closed

  • Default The New C# File Template to File-Scoped Namespace #44852

PullRequests

Created

  • Agent fixes #45369
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Avoid first-chance exception in resolver #45368
    untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary architecture parameter in vmr-build.yml #45361
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build the .NET SDK installer using the ASP.NET Core Runtime MSI instead of the wixlib #45346
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Ubuntu non dev versions leg from validation stage #45360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the Windows dev versions leg to x86 #45362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Suggest import statement based on common usage #38453
    Backlog
  • 'Add Imports' feature fails to show the expected namespace #31002
    Backlog
  • Unnecessary defensive copy in collection spread for ROS nullability change #76303
  • 'Prefer braces' feature shoudl be called 'Require braces' #29621
    Backlog
  • Prefer braces should have another option for not prefering braces iff on one line #41547
    Backlog
  • When `csharp_prefer_braces = true:error` build doesn't fail as expected. #62418
    Backlog
  • Code fix for `csharp_prefer_braces = true` adds blank line if another statement follows #70697
    Backlog
  • IDE0025 deletes comments in certain places #38058
    Backlog
  • Indenting with spaces after auto property code fix #29879
    Backlog

Updated

  • Area - Add Import #75750
    Backlog
  • Enumerators fails to set state to "after" in various scenarios observable with `GetEnumerator()` #76089
    17.13
  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
  • Area - Require Braces #76204
  • Area - Use Primary Constructor #76250
  • Area - Use Expression/Block Body #75777
    Backlog
  • `when_on_single_line` not enforced or supported? - [IDE0022,IDE0023,IDE0023,IDE0024,IDE0025,IDE0026,IDE0027] #69658
    18.0
  • IDE0025 strangely indents when a comment follows the property name #38057
    Backlog
  • Area - Use Auto Property #75771
    Backlog
  • Area - Remove Unused/Unread Member #76247
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Parentheses #76274
  • "Remove and Sort Usings" Ignores #pagma warning disable IDE0005 #26245
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Support adding package and reference assemblies from an import #76337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue with remove unused members and ref-fields #76336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue with nameof(MemberGroup) caused us to consider all members used #76335
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Indent expressions when converting to object initializer #76334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix formatting of accessor blocks in 'use block body' #76333
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'sort usings' to always preserve the new-lines that were present in the document #76332
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make it clearer when 'move declaration' might change semantics #76331
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Fix broken 'convert if to switch' case with recursive analysis #76317
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Add f1 item for global usings #76327
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify user experience with disparate 'generate constructor' features #76328
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML Static Binding Source Fails With. x:DataType #26467
  • Regression in GoToAsync behavior on Windows in 9.0.12 #26466
  • TitleView causes memory leaks #26463
  • [iOS] Warning due to implementation of "performFetchWithCompletionHandler" although "PerformFetch" was not implemented #26462

Closed

  • Entry inside ViewCell loose and regain focus on Android whenever typing #26464

PullRequests

Created

  • [XC] fix excessive boxing #26465
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Click on flyout clicks on page behind - fix #26461
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • [iOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #26456
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
